title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8000.2 - Renumbered or renamed routes, roads or locations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8000.2 - Renumbered or renamed routes, roads or locations

State Regulations

Subsequent renumbering or renaming of any route, road or
location contained in any Part of Chapter XI shall not affect the validity of
any regulation contained therein. Any reference to a route, road or location by
a name or number in existence at the time of promulgation of a regulation shall
be deemed to apply to such route, road or location even though such route, road
or location is subsequently renamed or renumbered. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8000.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
